projects.name: Assertables Rust crate

channels.description: You can fund via PayPal with your own PayPal account, or debit card, or credit card.
You can fund via Venmo with your own Venmo account, or debit card, or credit card.
You can pay via direct bank transfer if you wish, such as via U.S. Automated Clearning House (ACH) or worldwide wire transfer (Fedwire, SWIFT, etc.). Please e-mail me for details.
